metadata.title: CVE-2015-1536 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the Bitmap_createFromParcel function incore/jni/android/graphics/Bitmap.cpp in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48I allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (system_server crash) or obtainsensitive system_server memory-content information via a craftedapplication that leverages improper unmarshalling of bitmaps, aka internalbug 19666945.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
